name: Cross 4
description:
Get ready for some radical puzzle action!

Cross 4 is an addictive puzzle game where you must match 4 blocks in a row either vertically or horizontally. Be sure to match a certain number of rows before time runs out or its game over. Be alert, you never know which side of the screen a block may come from and special blocks will attempt to stop you from making a row!

Keyboard & PS4 Controller supported.

Press “Q” to exit the game.

Please report any bugs or concerns in the comments below.

1. Download ZIP

2. Extract all

3. Run .EXE
